item.title: Llama.cpp: Full CUDA GPU Acceleration
item.description: - This PR adds GPU acceleration for ggml tensors, improving performance for long generations and prompt processing.

item.title: Comic Mono
item.description: - 'Comic Mono' is a legible monospace font that is a fork of Shannon Miwa's 'Comic Shanns' font.

item.title: BBEdit: Where Respect Is Due
item.description: - BBEdit is a text and code editor that has been around since 1989 and is popular among developers, scientists, web designers, and writers.

item.title: AWS us-east-1 down
item.description: - The latest AWS outage in the us-east-1 region has caused widespread disruptions for websites and services.

item.title: Cormac McCarthy has died
item.description: - Cormac McCarthy, a reclusive and acclaimed writer known for his dark and violent novels, has passed away at the age of 89.

item.title: McDonald's just dropped a brand new Game Boy game
item.description: - McDonald's has released a brand new Game Boy Color game called Grimace's Birthday.

item.title: Apollo's Christian Selig explains his fight with Reddit â€“ & why users revolted
item.description: - Reddit recently announced new terms for its API, which allows developers of third-party apps to access Reddit's data.

item.title: Rewriting the Ruby parser
item.description: - Shopify has developed a new Ruby parser called YARP that can parse Ruby files in various codebases and gems.

item.title: Reddit subs with millions of followers plan to extend the blackout indefinitely
item.description: - Moderators of many popular Reddit communities are extending the blackout indefinitely to protest Reddit's expensive API pricing changes.

item.title: Private equity is buying everything from vet offices to tech conglomerates
item.description: - Private equity is the process of buying companies, making changes, and selling them for a profit.
